Name: Across The Globe
About the game: Across The Globe A grand Strategy Game Set In 19th-century World. Play The World Detailed world map, with five different projections to choose from. World wide trade network, witness globalization at its onset. Multi-thread optimized game engine, fast load and fast turns. Dynamic population People reproduce, age, die, migrate and change jobs. Government, economy, military are all fueled by your people. Different ideas steer the course of society. Realistic Economy Prices respond to demand and supply. Producers expand and shrink. Elastic demand depending on income and prices. Great Power Diplomacy Land and naval combat to conquer foes. Influence lesser nations to enforce free trade. Intervene in wars to contain your rivals.
